channel.title: Java error in lunix. [DEBIANVPS]
channel.description:
So i have my vps right? Then I get the server runnig, when someone tries to log in:
[QUOTE]FreezScape Online At Port: 43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from ****************** Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800 at Player.<init>(Player.java:75) at client.<init>(client.java:8949) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:73) at server.run(server.java:182) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:636) [/QUOTE]Why does it do this????
thanks!

item.title: Java error in lunix. [DEBIANVPS]
item.dc:creator: @appletart appletart
item.description:
@appletart wrote:

So i have my vps right? Then I get the server runnig, when someone tries to log in:

[QUOTE]FreezScape Online At Port: 43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from ******************
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800
at Player.(Player.java:75)
at client.(client.java:8949)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:73)
at server.run(server.java:182)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:636)
[/QUOTE]Why does it do this???

thanks!
